member.name: T:MarketingPlatform.API.Extensions.CspExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for Content Security Policy (CSP) nonce access in views and controllers.

member.name: M:MarketingPlatform.API.Extensions.CspExtensions.GetCspNonce(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext)
member.summary: Retrieves the CSP nonce for the current request. This nonce should be used in inline script and style tags to comply with CSP.
member.param: The HttpContext for the current request
member.returns: The CSP nonce string, or empty string if not available
member.example:
Usage in Razor views:
<script nonce="@Context.GetCspNonce()"> // Your inline JavaScript code </script>
<style nonce="@Context.GetCspNonce()"> /* Your inline CSS */ </style>
Or access directly via Items:
<script nonce="@Context.Items["csp-nonce"]"> // Your inline JavaScript code </script>

member.name: M:MarketingPlatform.API.Extensions.CspExtensions.HasCspNonce(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext)
member.summary: Checks if a CSP nonce is available for the current request.
member.param: The HttpContext for the current request
member.returns: True if a nonce is available, false otherwise

member.name: T:MarketingPlatform.API.Middleware.CspMiddleware
member.summary: Middleware for implementing Content Security Policy (CSP) with nonce-based inline script/style execution. Generates a unique cryptographically secure nonce per request and sets appropriate CSP headers based on the environment (Development vs Production).

member.name: M:MarketingPlatform.API.Middleware.CspMiddleware.GenerateNonce
member.summary: Generates a cryptographically secure random nonce.
member.returns: Base64-encoded nonce string

member.name: M:MarketingPlatform.API.Middleware.CspMiddleware.BuildDevelopmentCsp(System.String)
member.summary: Builds a CSP header for development environment. More permissive to allow hot reload, browser-link, and WebSocket connections. Uses specific port ranges for common development tools to maintain security.
member.param: The nonce to include in the CSP
member.returns: CSP header value

member.name: M:MarketingPlatform.API.Middleware.CspMiddleware.BuildProductionCsp(System.String)
member.summary: Builds a strict CSP header for production environment. Uses nonces for inline scripts/styles without allowing unsafe-inline or unsafe-eval.
member.param: The nonce to include in the CSP
member.returns: CSP header value

member.name: T:MarketingPlatform.API.Middleware.RateLimitingMiddleware
member.summary: Middleware for API rate limiting and throttling
